title: Torchlight Video Game Font
content:
I am looking to figure out what the font below is. Thanks in advance. More examples can be found over at [http://www.torchlightgame.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704050710/http:/www.torchlightgame.com/).

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704050710/http:/typophile.com/files/font_23.png) | 10.4 KB |
author: Zwigby

comments.content: Looks like a knock-off of [Totally Glyphic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704050710/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=127). (Or the other way â€™round? Who knows.)
